title: Art World Magazine
content:
hi everyone, i’ve just bought the first 2 issues of the australian edition of Art World Magazine and i love the typeface they use for their headings, and all through the magazine.

unfortunatly i don’t have a scanner, so i can’t scan some fo the pages, but here is the their website: [http://www.artworldmagazine.com.au/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408033931/http:/www.artworldmagazine.com.au/ "http://www.artworldmagazine.com.au/")

any ideas?

thanks!

 [‹ Ali boxing poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408033931/http:/typophile.com/node/43945 "Go to previous forum topic") [DVD font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408033931/http:/typophile.com/node/43954 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Simon Robertson

comments.content: ok, so i didn’t spell check, sorry.

yes! Giza 75 it is (at least i think so.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/giza/sevenfive/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408033931/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/giza/sevenfive/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/giza/sevenfive/")

thanks!
